channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.description: 🟢 00.00 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 23:43 Air alarm to the Rivne region follow the following messages.
